title: What are some good books on South Indian history? - Quora

response.answer_text: some good books on South Indian history: The history of the southern part of India covers a span of over four thousand years during which the region saw the rise and fall of a number of dynasties and empires. The period of known history of the region begins with the Iron age (1200 BCE to 24 BCE) period until the 14th century CE. Dynasties of Satavahana, Chola, Chalukya, Pallava, Rashtrakuta, Kakatiya and Hoysala were at their peak during various periods of history.   A History of South India: From Prehistoric Times to the Fall of VijayanagarThe Penguin History of Early India: From the Origins to AD 1300 by RomilaThe Wonder That Was India: 1 by A.L. BashamThe Penguin History of Early India: From the Origins to AD 1300
